Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:21#19#crag cullars} and {@LinkCreature:21#20#crag hopper tentacullars} are moving closer and threatening the village.

I don't have soldiers to spare, so I'd like you to kill these vermin and collect the cullar sap. It has considerable medicinal qualities.

I appreciate your willingness to jump into the fray, .

Those cullars won't bother us for now and the sap will help our wounded.
We could really use that sap, <PCNAME>. Those critters shouldn't pose a danger to you.
